name: cobalance-monorepo
description: CoBalance - Smart Ledger & Expense Sharing App

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && cd ..
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && cd ..
scripts.fresh-start: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
